detail_desc: 5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a button at the waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Set with braces and a bow tie. Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied, patterned bow tie with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Iron-on fabric patch to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 12 cm.
Calf-length skirt in satin with a high waist and decorative ties at the front. Concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.
Lace skirt with an elasticated waist. Lined.

Jacket in soft fleece made partly from recycled polyester designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, long-sleeved dress in velour with a V-neck, decorative knot detail with gathers at the waist and a seam at the back.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a welt seam around the soles and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and TPR (thermoplastic rubber) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Leather sandals with straps with adjustable fasteners and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts. Jersey T-shirt with press-studs on one shoulder and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short, fitted vest top in a soft rib knit with a round neckline.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave with creases and narrow, contrasting trims at the hem. Concealed zip and press-stud in the side. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Nursing dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Elasticated seam at the waist with a tie. Unlined.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a regular, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt and side pockets.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups with removable inserts, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back with a ventilating mesh detail. Wide elastication at the hem. Medium support.
Small pouch bag in sturdy imitation leather with a zip at the top. Size 9.5x13 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved dress with a knitted top in a soft cotton blend with a small appliqué on the front and buttons at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt in woven fabric.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey that can be worn off the shoulder with decorative buttons down the front and short sleeves. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short V-neck dress in sturdy satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a seam under the bust, concealed zip at the back and flared skirt. Lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Imitation leather ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 8 cm.
Trainer socks in fast-drying, functional fabric with a ribbed section around the foot and ribbed elastication at the top for best fit.

Blouse in a crisp weave. Open section at the back with ties at the back of the neck and middle of the back. Half-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam at the waist with a peplum.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with a satin front and double shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side and slits in the sides of the hem. Lined at the top.
Scuba shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and perforated panels down the sides of the legs..
Short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and sleeves.
Fitted jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with long, wide sleeves and ribbed cuffs.
Metal earrings decorated with semi-precious and sparkly stones and long fringes made of thin metal chains.
Shortie briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey made from a viscose blend with long sleeves. Unlined.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved shirt in washed denim with buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke at the back, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers woven in a wool blend with a high waist and zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets and wide, tapered legs with visible seams front and back.
Metal earrings with patterned plastic pendants. Hexagonal plate at the top and rectangular pendant below. Length 4.5 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Soft inside.
Calf-length trousers in woven fabric with side pockets, fake back pockets and a concealed zip in the side. Wide, straight legs with a seam at the hem and a slit and lacing at the sides.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Sleeveless top in a textured viscose weave with a low-cut back that has a tie detail at the bottom. Seam and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with a racer back and rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with coloured lights on the soles that flash with each step taken. Elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top, mesh linings and insoles, and patterned soles.

Super push-up lace bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastic at the hems.
Coiled plastic hair elastics.
Soft jersey top in a relaxed fit with short sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Longer-style, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels and welt front pockets. Lined.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and reflective details.
Long, wide dress in an airy weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps that tie at the back and tiers to the hem. Unlined.
High-waisted leggings in microfibre with a wide waist panel. The leggings are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Soft jersey tops with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with a wide foldover at the top, wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Lace thong briefs with an elastic-trimmed mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Batik-patterned swimsuit in recycled polyester with flounced shoulder straps and a lined gusset.
Large rectangular hair clips in metal and plastic. Length approx. 7.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in a rib knit with wide, rib-knit shoulder straps that join at the back.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Wide one-shoulder top in a crinkled viscose and cotton blend with a wide flounce at the top.

Two-button jacket in woven fabric containing some wool and linen with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double vent at the back. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. For the matching trousers, look for: 0710650.
Short, straight-cut coat in soft pile with large notch lapels, a concealed fastening with press-studs at the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with a print motif and appliqués on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a stripe print.
Fitted T-shirts in soft, stretch organic cotton jersey with a V-neck and straight-cut hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft stretch fabric with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the top and elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and hems. One patterned pair.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and visible flatlock seams.
Short, sleeveless top in crocheted cotton. Narrow cut at the front with narrow shoulder straps and a scalloped top edge.

Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, side and back pockets and buttons at the sides. Short legs with sewn-in turn-ups and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
